message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent cut.  Accept this and we're both happy.
You took a big cut last round, now it's my turn to be fair. I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to be generous.
I rejected your offer because it wasn't fair. Let's split this 50/50 and call it a day. It's the only way we can both get a good deal.
I'm not going for a 50/50 split. You took a bigger cut last round, now I'll take a slightly bigger cut this round. Don't expect me to be generous.
We're both losing money with each round. Let's end this now, and I'll even offer you a slightly larger share than before.
You're trying to buy me off with a slightly larger share, but I'm not that desperate yet. I'll take a slightly larger share than my last offer, but you're still getting less than half.
